devdoc.details: This contract demonstrates the use of constructors in Solidity. The contract initializes an `owner` variable through the constructor and provides  a way to receive Ether and withdraw it only by the owner.

constructor.details: Constructor that sets the deployer of the contract as the owner. The constructor is executed once when the contract is deployed.

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw function allows the owner to withdraw a specified `amount` of Ether from the contract. Reverts if the caller is not the owner or if the contract balance is insufficient.

params.amount: The amount of Ether (in wei) to withdraw from the contract.

devdoc.title: Constructors Example
